name: Another Chance (ConorPreston)
description:
Another Chance is a game set in a future in which the planet has become inhospitable. Years later humans have sent down robot probes to survey the environement and start to rebuild the planet your job is to collect living plant life and use this to aid in rebuilding the ecosystem.

Created in one week for the Unreal Engine 2020 Epic Mega Jam based on the theme "it's been a long time but we're not done yet"
